TERMS AND CONDITIONS

Terms of Use

1. Introduction

These are the Terms and Conditions of Use for the SankalpTaru Foundation online website.
SankalpTaru Foundation is an NGO, having its office at Plot no. 12, Dhoran Khas, Kishanpur, Near ST. Xaviers School, Canal Road, Uttarakhand -248001, India which has its online portal at https://sankalptaru.org/ (the “Site”). By using (browsing or donating on) our Site or by subscribing to or using any of our services (“Services”), you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms of use (collectively, the “Terms of Use”).
Please review the following terms carefully. If you do not agree to any of these terms, please do not use this Site. These Terms of Use and various other policies are binding as per the provisions of the Information Technology (Intermediaries Guidelines) Rules 2011 formulated under the Information Technology Act 2000.
The Term ‘ST’ or ‘us’ or ‘we’ refers to the owner of the website, i.e., SankalpTaru Foundation. Our NGO registration number is 368/211 – 2012 and is registered in Dehradun, Uttarakhand, India. The term “you” or “your” refers to you, the user or viewer of our site or any of the Services.
The use of this website is subject to the following terms of use:

) } export default Terms
